Container.Name: spt-fika
Container.Overview:
SPT AKI server backend with optional Fika mod (can be disabled on first run). Based off the generous work of zedramus and fellow contributors: https://github.com/zhliau/fika-spt-server-docker.
Current SPT version: 3.10.5
Current Fika server version: v2.3.6
This is a barebones template to get your SPT/Fika server running quickly on Unraid.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider donating.

Config.Name: Server Files
Config.Description: Location of required server files, user profiles, server (user/mod) mods, etc.

Config.Name: Listening Port
Config.Description: Leave this alone unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: Listen on All Interfaces
Config.Description: Sets http.json 'backendIp' value to 0.0.0.0, telling SPT to listen on all interfaces.

Config.Name: Enable Profile Backup
Config.Description: Creates a cron job that handles profile backups.
